infobox.description: The world of programming can be lonely, difficult to penetrate, and confusing to navigate. We provide guidance and companionship for those traveling the programming road. Members of the Hive support one another in figuring out where to begin, where to go, and how to overcome coding obstacles and the occasional (or, sometimes, more than occasional) bouts of procrastination.

infoimages.content: We help community members learn and grow as programmers, and produce programming and technology-related educational materials.
infoimages.subtitle: Learn To Code
